head.title: The Seafood Supermarket - Taste of the Sea

meta.content: We can guarantee the highest quality, freshest fish and seafood because all our fish is graded and frozen at sea, within minutes of being caught. So from cod to crab, prawns to perch or turbot to tuna, we have it all. Buy whole, in fillets or in portions, the choice is yours and it’s delivered to your plate as fresh as when it was caught.
meta.name: Description

div.div: You are here: HOME -> Our Stores

img.alt: Taste of the Sea - The Seafood Supermarket

div.div:
Glasnevin Store:
Our first store opened August 2010. It is situated at 130 Slaney Road, Glasnevin, Dublin 11, where the Slaney road meets the Finglas road opposite the famous Glasnevin Cemetery. The store, with almost 2,000 sq. ft. of shopping space is located in a retail cluster just at the entrance to Dublin Industrial Estate, in front of LIDL and opposite Woodies.
Parking:
We share LIDL’s 200-space car park, so you can always find parking.
Ennis Store:
We opened this store in December 2011 it is situated in the heart of Market Square, Ennis, Co.Clare. There is ample parking located near the store.
Our Stores are Your Stores:
We want to design our stores and stock the products that suit you, our customer. We are happy to hear your recommendations or take your questions. See contacts below: ‘If you have any further questions about our company or services/products, or you would like to discuss your needs in more detail, you can contact us on the telephone number shown below. Alternatively complete the form at the bottom of this page and a member of our team will contact you.
Our Address Details Are:
